name: Jetman Hero - Jetpack Shooter
description:
Jetman Hero - Part Joust, part defender shooter - 100% authentic arcade fun!

Ride your Jetpack to GLORY!

Baddies and Bosses galore!

Fly and fight through the hordes of enemies as you try to to take on the evil Bosses. Ultimate fight versus the Mega-Boss!

"Truly has that Arcade HARD feel..."

Numerous enemies and bosses to beat with some surprises along the way...

Extra life given if you score over 1000.

Action shooter for #Lowrezjam2016

Check out Gazzapper Games on Playstore!!

Keyboard Controls

A or Left Arrow = Left

D or Right Arrow = Right

Enter or Up Arrow or W = Jetpack

R-Shift = Fire

XBOX Controller / Gamepad Joystick controls

Analogue up = jetpack

Analogue left = Left

Analogue right = right

A = Fire

(Note: when flying with stick once you choose a direction you just fly in that direction by pressing Up on stick, dont have to do up and left)

CREDITS

Coding & GFX by Gary Plowman (Gazzapper Games @Gazzapper)

Chiptune Music by Craig Barnes (@cbstegeman)

Developed with GLBASIC
